meanings.definition: Having no equal or rival; surpassing all others.
meanings.sent1: Her talent is unrivaled in the entire school.
meanings.sent2: The team's performance was truly unrivaled that day.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unrivaled ability to catch mice amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise painted an unrivaled masterpiece across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the garden was unrivaled, leaving visitors in awe.

meanings.sent1: The chef's cooking skills are truly unrivaled in this town.
meanings.sent2: The company's dedication to quality is unrivaled in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's unrivaled speed in gathering nuts made it a local legend.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range offered an unrivaled view of the valley below.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice was unrivaled, captivating the audience with its beauty.
